decision_conditions: The development permitted shall be begun before the expiration of three years from the date of this permission.
Reason: In order to comply with the provisions of the Town and Country Planning Act 1990 (as amended).
| The development hereby approved shall be carried out in accordance with drawing title number(s):

Drawing number E 0001 - Existing location plan, Drawing number E 0002 - Existing block plan, Drawing number E 0009 - Existing basement plan, Drawing number E 0010 - Existing ground floor plan, Drawing number E 0011 - Existing first floor plan, Drawing number E 0012 - Existing second floor plan, Drawing number E 0013 - Existing roof plan, Drawing number E 0301 - Existing front elevation, Drawing number E 0302 - Existing side (north) elevation, Drawing number E 0303 - Existing rear elevation, Drawing number E 0304 - Existing side (south) elevation, Drawing number E 0401 - Existing section, Drawing number E 0402 - Existing section,

Drawing number P0001 A - Proposed site plan, Drawing number P0009 A - Proposed basement floor plan, Drawing number P0010 C - Proposed ground floor plan, Drawing number P0011 B - Proposed first floor plan, Drawing number P0012 B - Proposed second floor plan, Drawing number P0013 A - Proposed roof plan, Drawing number P0301 A - Proposed front elevation, Drawing number P0302 C - Proposed side (north) elevation, Drawing number P303 B - Proposed rear elevation, Drawing number P304 B - Proposed side (south) elevation, Drawing number P401 B - Proposed section, Drawing number P402 A - Proposed rear section,
Reason: For the avoidance of doubt, and in the interests of proper planning.

| Prior to the construction of the single storey side and rear extension, details of materials to be used for the external surfaces of the development shall be submitted to and approved in writing by the Local Planning Authority. This condition shall apply notwithstanding any indications as to these matters which have been given in this application. Development shall be carried out only in accordance with the approved details and permanently retained thereafter.
For the avoidance of doubt, this condition purely relates to the single storey side and rear extension only.

Reason: To ensure that the materials harmonise with the surroundings, in accordance with policies 1.1 & 1.2 of the Ealing Core Strategy (2012), policies 7.4, 7B and 7C of the Ealing Development Management Development Plan Document (2013), policies D1, D4 and HC1 of the London Plan (2021) and the National Planning Policy Framework (2021).

| Prior to changing all of the windows, details of materials to be used for the replacement windows shall be submitted to and approved in writing by the Local Planning Authority. This condition shall apply notwithstanding any indications as to these matters which have been given in this application. Development shall be carried out only in accordance with the approved details and permanently retained thereafter.

Reason: To ensure that the materials harmonise with the surroundings, in accordance with policies 1.1 & 1.2 of the Ealing Core Strategy (2012), policies 7.4, 7B and 7C of the Ealing Development Management Development Plan Document (2013), policies D1, D4 and HC1 of the London Plan (2021) and the National Planning Policy Framework (2021).

| Prior to the construction of the bin store at the front of the site, details of the design and materials to be used for this bin store shall be submitted to and approved in writing by the Local Planning Authority. This condition shall apply notwithstanding any indications as to these matters which have been given in this application. Development shall be carried out only in accordance with the approved details and permanently retained thereafter.

Reason: To ensure that the materials harmonise with the surroundings, in accordance with policies 1.1 & 1.2 of the Ealing Core Strategy (2012), policies 7.4, 7B and 7C of the Ealing Development Management Development Plan Document (2013), policies D1, D4 and HC1 of the London Plan (2021) and the National Planning Policy Framework (2021).
description: Single storey rear extension (following demolition of existing) proposed internal alterations involving removal of cupboard in the front room (basement level), removal of ground floor partition to the WC and cupboard, replacement of privacy screen to window above the stairs at basement level, installation of doors to opening between the front and rear rooms at ground floor, removal of fireplace surround in the living room at ground floor, at first floor removal of bathroom sanitary-ware, doors and partitions, reinstatement of original arch into bedrooms, relocation of door to front room and removal of partition wall of the lobby entrance to the bedroom, at second floor removal of cupboard, relocation of doorway and installation of new partition. External alterations; restoration of the wooden treillage porch, decorative ironwork to the first floor balconies, replacement of single glazed timber framed windows to rear and front elevation by double glazed mullioned sash windows, re-painting of front door, minor repairs to guttering and fascia, proposed works to the front boundary wall and a new front bin enclosure, installation of steps to garden from existing basement to Listed Building
